game.description: Investigate the strange occurrences in the abandoned mine and put an end to whatever evil is stirring within.
game.objective: Put a stop to the darkness spreading from the old mine.
game.quest_giver: Gorm, the gruff but fair-minded town mayor.
game.reward: A set of common adventurer's tools and 50 gold pieces.

tasks.description: Explore the north tunnel until you find the source of the disturbance.
tasks.location: The North Tunnel in the Abandoned Mine
tasks.objective: Find the source of the strange noises.

tasks.description: Defeat the goblin leader, Biter, and free the enslaved dwarves.
tasks.location: Biter's Lair, Deep within the mine
tasks.objective: Put an end to Biter's evil plans.

game.title: The Darkness in the Mine
